message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $180. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.
I understand you're a savvy buyer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I can offer you a compromise at $170. It's a great price for a fantastic product!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation. I am willing to pay $160 for the product.

I'm glad we're still negotiating, Bob! I can see you're serious about the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $165. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $162 for the product.
I'm not quite there yet, Bob, but I'm getting closer. I can offer it to you for $168. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $166 for the product.
I'm not budging much more, Bob, but I can see you're serious about the product. I'll meet you at $169. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
Thank you for your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $167 for the product.
